location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Crommelin, Thomas Byfield, John Spencer, Charles Waters, Peter Elwin Wrench, Samuel Court, and Cecil Bowyer, President and Council at Bombay Castle, to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is cover for a shipment of broadcloth and perpets and encloses some remarks on accounts (not present). Also confirms Jervis as Resident at Bushire and directs that all orders and accounts are to go through the Agency at Bussorah [Basra].
